name: Breakfast: Operation Escape
description:
Story

In a faraway land a young Toast is kidnapped along with his friends by pigs who want to eat them. Help Mr. Toast escape from the ferocity of his tormentors.

Why this game?

This game was created for the Mini Jam 87 competition with the theme Break and the limitation "The player is a pacifist".

Credits

Thanks to Bensound for the music
